website_summaries.verdict: A cozy and comfortable mattress topper at a significantly lower price point than some competitors.
pros: Stands out for being an excellent value for the price
Users praise the softness and comfort of this topper
Also gets top marks for not having a chemical odor after opening
cons: At 1.5 inches, this model is thinner than others
Foam is not very dense, so those wanting a firmer topper may want to opt for another model

customer_reviews.title: Torn&Dirty - Unhappy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just received my topper today. I rolled it onto the mattress and wasn’t very happy. I like the product but disappointed. It’s seems like it would be super comfortable and exactly what I had hoped for but it’s dirty and there are puncture marks/ tear on the corner.not to mention little chunks torn. Was this maybe a returned product? There are smudge like fingerprints all over the top. So now do I just deal with the product or return it and wait for it to arrive and then get the replacement? Wasted time. This very well could have been a fluke but disappointed since I needed to use this for guests visiting.
customer_reviews.author: iceute

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly shocked. I purchased this topper without any expectations. 1. Because it's cheap. 2. Because I've never bought an item like this before and had no idea what to look for, what type to buy, etc. Like I said above. I'm shocked. I am using this in conjunction with the Beckham luxury plush topper/pad and my bed feels better than it did brand new. I can't believe it. The plush topper is also an incredible value. Definitely recommend buying them both together.
customer_reviews.author: Manders

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for our tent camper!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on the mattress that came with the tent camper. I had limited space when the trailer was closed so I didn't go thicker than 1.5". It made a very good improvement over the original mattress! I bought one for each bed. It can be used on top of an air mattress, giving additional comfort. It arrived as promised, on time. It unfolded easily and I followed the instructions for allowing it to air before putting a mattress cover and sheet on it. The grand kids loved the comfort also so it was a winner for us!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best Find in Memory Foam
customer_reviews.text: Unexpectedly suprised on how awesome this Green Tea Memory Foam topper feels under these old bones. I am 100 percent satisfied! It fits perfectly on a RV short queen bed.
customer_reviews.author: DDiva

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a full size, not sure what I recieved? From the picture you can tell it is short, by a few inches. I called Zinus and they blew me off and blamed Amazon. Im sorry but Amazon didn't make the product. Amazon cannot do a return because I'm at an APO address. They did give a partial refund. I would recommend you look considered anyone other than Zinus.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give negative stars I would. The topper arrived so tightly compacted that I left if out in a warm room for 10 days after delivery waiting for it to expand completely. It never did. There are huge areas that haven’t expanded at all. It’s lumpy and doesn’t come close to covering the mattress. The edges are wavy. The first photo is the day it arrived. The next two are more than a week later. It never improved from what you see in those last two photos. It’s going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wilder

customer_reviews.title: I would feel terrible making a guest sleep on this because the odor ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on October 1st 2017 and it's been in my spare bedroom since then and has yet to stop stinking (March 2018). I would feel terrible making a guest sleep on this because the odor is so strong I would expect them to develop a sore throat from the off gassing. I also have questions on why this foam would stink for almost 6 months? What is it made of that is so toxic? I'm sorry I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Pevensie

customer_reviews.title: but it took over a week to look anything like normal. When it came out of the box ...
customer_reviews.text: We ended up keeping it because our mattress is too firm, but it took over a week to look anything like normal. When it came out of the box it was squished and warped, but we figured with memory foam that is to be expected. We laid it out on a flat surface for a few days and it was still squished at the edges and warped. We left it for another few days and finally decided to try it out even though it was still a bit squished at the edges. We put the squished edges near the end of the bed and it worked fine, but it was definitely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katherina Payne

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to alleviate lower back pain. Worked great for the first 2 months. Worked ok in months 3-4. Since then it is lumpy, provides no additional support and I’m stuck with back pain again and $115 of useless foam. Their “warranty” specifically excludes up to 1 1/2” of memory foam deterioration which basically makes it a useless warranty when the topper has only 2” of memory foam to begin with
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Like Sleeping on a Cloud
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This is the best thing in my life! My mattress was causing me to wake up with an aching back and I couldn't stand it anymore. I went on a search and found the Zinus 3 Inch Green Tea Memory Foam Mattress Topper on a Lightening Deal. I took the plunge and I am so glad I did! This thing is a dream. No smell or problems with packaging. I will recommend buying a non-skid rug matand sheet fastenersto help keep this one the mattress. The first week it kept sliding around by morning but with those two additions it now stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Bad product or bad shipping???
customer_reviews.text: The first 2 pictures are the replacement product we received. It appears a tire ran over the mattress topper and left a black mark down the center and peeled the foam. The last 2 pictures are the original mattress topper we received. It is in 2 layers and the top green layer never would decompress and it is peeling away from the bottom layer all around the edges. Both boxes we received looked good..no damage on the outside of the box. Not sure if this is bad product or something in the packaging for shipping. I was able to get a refund and finally return the topper, which is impossible to get back in any box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made a world of difference!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where the weird photos and bad reviews are coming from but this arrived just as discribed. Bought it for our queen short mattress in our travel trailer and it made A WORLD of difference! Slept the whole night through and didn’t wake up achy and sore as before we had it! Did have the slight odor that was mentioned when first opened but not bad. I just opened it in our camper and let it sit on our mattress two days befor I enclosed it into our zipper cover and it was fine. Great comfort for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Snshyne4u2c

customer_reviews.title: Save your back
customer_reviews.text: We put this in the camper and it made a world of difference for comfort. We bought a year old camper and the original owners kept the original heated mattress. We got a nice looking Serta in it's place but it just wasn't very comfortable. The Serta was designed to be on a box spring, not laying on a board. We haven't experienced the "camper back" since putting this under that Serta mattress. Happy camping to all and to all a good night's sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Transforms the sofa bed
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. This transforms my sofa bed into something my parents may actually be somewhat comfortable sleeping on. I had hoped that I'd be able to fold it up into the couch with the bed. And technically, I can get it to squeeze in, but it distorts the seat cushions, so I had to store it in the garage. The two inch foam topper may have fit better in the couch, but I doubt it would have been as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ferre

customer_reviews.title: Smooshed Foam
customer_reviews.text: Updated: upon letting the mattress sit for 24 hours, the majority of foam restored, but the left side continued to stay smooshed. And if you are sensitive to smell, don't buy this mattress because it smells so bad it burned my nose. I wish the entire foam had restored properly. Thickness was as described ( at least on the side that restored)
customer_reviews.author: new mother

customer_reviews.title: 4” too short for a short queen
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and rolled out the topper. First thing I noticed was two rips in the foam. Feels comfortable enough when I laid down for a minute and no noticeable smell. Just not happy about paying so much for something already ripped upon arrival Update: when it completely expanded I discovered it is only 70” long and not 74” which is the size of a short Queen, plus the two layers are coming apart in places. Customer service sent me a replacement. It is still 4” too short. This is NOT the size of a short queen!!
customer_reviews.author: dkamper

customer_reviews.title: We got this for our travel trailer thinking anything would be better than that old springy mattress that it came with ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG! We got this for our travel trailer thinking anything would be better than that old springy mattress that it came with and all I can say is wow... I think it is actually more comfortable than our expensive memory foam mattress in our house! To the point that I am seriously considering putting one on our home mattress. We had to trim it down with a razor knife to accommodate our RV space, but with the leftover material, my wife is going to make a pillow. I am thoroughly impressed as we looked at department store brands that cost substantially more and this was far more comfortable. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Erskine

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Bought for our camper bed and it great! Very comfortable. Husband prefers soft bed and I liked the hard camper bed and was hesitant in buying a foam topper but am so glad I did! It is so comfortable for both of us! I read comments that suggested to let it lay flat and air out a couple days. We did for two days and now the packaging smell is gone and is nice. I don't feel like it get too hot either!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 starts all days I love my Zinus
customer_reviews.text: It’s incredible I have building disk herniated disk scoliosis and when I put this on top of my Zinus us memory foam bed that’s it hands down best bed ever feeling like I’m on cloud 9 it came in perfect all I own is Zinus thank you and thank you amazon!!! I highly recommend this all day HANDS DOWN!!
customer_reviews.author: Tunes

customer_reviews.title: I let it breathe & laid out in the spare ...
customer_reviews.text: I let it breathe & laid out in the spare room for 3 days. For the most part it took shape, except the edge that way on the inter roll. I took a blow dryer to get it to shape up. It worked, medium heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made My Girlfriend's Mattress Usable
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend, whom I love very dearly, has the stiffest mattress I've ever come across. I say this with no hyperbole, it is exactly like laying on a board. She doesn't really mind it, but I always get back and side pains when I stay the night. Well, I should say that I used to get back and side pains, now I wake up rested enough, and it's thanks to this thing. Without it, I would probably be at the chiropractor right now, but it has made a pretty big difference. So, if your mattress sucks, get this, you won't regret it. And if you have a pretty good mattress, get this, you'll be in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Trask

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money for something else
customer_reviews.text: Price point was on and reviews were mediocre but decided to give it a shot anyway and in hindsight I should have spent the extra money. Foam ripped while removing it from its plastic - the green portion ... all you have to do is lift up on it just a little and it tears away easily from larger portion. NOT cooling what so ever - just a pretty green with same density as yellow foam. Would I buy again or recommend - chances are no
customer_reviews.author: kandykanekan

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: I was also a little concerned about this item when I saw the photos others had posted. Mine also looked way to small and smashed but I followed the directions and let it rest for a day and it puffed up to the expected size. No smell. It did have a few small air bubble holes in it but I doubt that would cause any issue with durability. I had heard that stuffing this foam into sofa pillows will keep them from getting compacted and sloppy looking so that is what I ordered it for. It worked perfectly! I would recommend this. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Zookeeper

customer_reviews.title: Comfy enough, no quality control for consistency
customer_reviews.text: While it is not uncomfortable, it actually is, it is too short and too skinny for the bed. The measurements they put on the description are not what it is. I wrote the company to get a product replacement. While their communication was fine, what they sent as a replacement is not. It is even shorter and skinnier than the original. There is 1 3/4 in on either side of our bed that is not covered and now 6 inches at the bottom that is not covered. I would never buy a product from this company again because I'm not sure what I'm going to get.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: Small investment, huge rewards.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly just to add 2 inches to a mattress so it would clear a wooden box frame. When I first got it I was worried that it would be much too soft (I have slept on a firmer mattress for years). I slept like a baby the first night on it. I've been sleeping on it now for over a week and I am consistently sleeping better. I've also noticed that I have less lower back pain when I wake up, and throughout the day. To say that I am happy with my purchase is an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: C Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Mildew!!!
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened, but took a chance... Didn't even get the box in the door before I could smell the mildew!! Opened the box and about threw up. Outside was perfectly dry. Once I got to the middle it was horrid. Decided to put it downstairs to see if it would air out. It didn't even inflate. Looked like it was "torn" off the roll instead of cut. Horribly cut off center, hand and tear marks, part of it looked almost melted. Had it not had mildew and actually inflated it wouldn't have mattered. It was way too short no matter which way you measured... lol. Horrible, horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Not memory foam and very hot!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this topper two stars only because it didn’t have an odor. I thought that was great! Otherwise I’m not happy with it. This NOT a memory foam topper. It’s foam with no memory and it is VERY HOT at night. I was super disappointed by this. I was worried when I picked up the box and it was so light. Usually memory foam is heavier. It also usually takes a while to expand. It was fully expanded within a couple minutes of unwrapping it. I wish I would’ve went with a different one.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable topper
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend likes rock hard beds while I like clouds that you can’t easily get out of haha so our mattress is pretty firm, we tried a 2 inch topper which I LOVED but it was too soft for him... this 1 1/2 inch he says is much better and for me it’s just what I need to keep my body from hurting. I’m a side sleeper so firm mattresses kill my back. Did not smell at all when I took it out which was a nice surprise as our previous one needed a couple days to air out. Fully foamed up in about an hour to an hour and a half? Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Back pain gone!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to purchase this. I am a 32 year old, decently fit female who has been having lower back pain for several months. I suspected it was due to my near 13 year old mattress but didn’t have enough money to replace it yet. I got this mattress pad to buy me time. Best decision I’ve made in a while! Within a week my back pain was completely gone and I haven’t had issues since (2 months approximately). I would recommend this to anybody. Fits perfectly and the new smell went away quickly with an open window that first day.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Bonham

customer_reviews.title: works great you don't feel the center bar in your back/
customer_reviews.text: bought for motorhome sofa bed. works great you don't feel the center bar in your back/
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Unpacking was very easy. You just unfold and lay it out to take it's true form and mine did so in less than a few minutes. There is a smell that goes away in about 30 minutes to an hour. The item made my bed very comfortable and added some height, which I like. It is very comfortable and affordable. It's going to save me from buying a whole new mattress. Update: after having this for a few months, I can say it made a real change to the comfort of my bed. The problem I have with it is that it won't stay in place. I have to constantly move it back and that's a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: LaTasha Neal

customer_reviews.title: Really great!
customer_reviews.text: I've actually ordered 2 of these, one for university and one to keep at my mom's apartment. It works perfectly, and I didn't get one with a bad smell or anything. It feels really nice and it's wonderful to sleep on. Both of them have held their shape really well, with no indents or anything forming over time. The only problem I've had is with my nails or fingers accidentally cutting/ripping into it while moving it or packing up, but so far I haven't actually lost any pieces of it. I would definitely recommend paying a little more to get the 3 or 4 inch version, but the 1 inch works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Low quality. But about the quality you would expect for this low price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it three stars sheerly because am I really expecting a lot for the price of the product. However I will admit I am highly disappointed I feel the product is misrepresented. The bottom bit of foam is not memory foam it's just foam. The gel bit on top is low-quality. Again for the price and my immediate need its fine. I'm more disappointed in Amazon for their Amazon choice tag on this product I will keep in mind in the future that Amazon choice tags do not denote quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress topper it makes my bed soooo much more comfortable! Even for only being 1.5 inches it makes a big difference. I'm a college student sleeping on an apartment provided mattress that has pretty uncomfortable springs that bulge out but with this topper the springs aren't even noticeable. I was quite surprised how deformed it was after opening the box and it didn't seem to be filling/straightening out very well but I gave it a few more days and it is completely fine so don't be discouraged if it's not flat after a day or two. Overall though love this product, great quality for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Super comfortable- almost more than my pillow top mattress. Doesn't make me sweat like a regular foam mattress, either. Within a day of unwrapping, it laid flat. A slight smell noticed but was gone after about 2 weeks. Not as bulky as I thought it would be , but I'm not sure I could roll it back up myself. We used it to sleep in the back of our Pathfinder and as a topper on a very worn mattress. Slept like a baby every time.
customer_reviews.author: Pat mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy People Rejoice! Support and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: If you are a larger person, this is what you are looking for. Its dense enough for you to not “smush” through making it useless. Its denser than the other 4inch gel style mattress toppers and will hold you and support you. I have pain spots on my back and this has helped reduce my issues. Out of the box, it inflated to its full-size quickly. Slept on it the same night. Mine did not the odor other people described.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son to go on the bed in his dorm room. This was the second step for trying to fix the bed. We had to put plywood under the mattress because the springs were garbage (my bed at basic training at Ft. Benning wasn't as bad as this thing). Next, we put this on top. He said it helped and he can at least get some sleep now. I haven't used this, so I don't know that much about it. All I can say is that it was packaged nicely and didn't have any odors when unboxed. The quality seemed okay as well. I'll try to update this when he comes home for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McKeehan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! Got this in Wednesday, shipping was right on time. For the price honestly, it could have been better. Provided pictures of topper and two places that just seem to have fallen apart. I could have went to Walmart and got something of the same sort for a little less. It’s comfortable but I would return if it wasn’t for the cost of return shipping. Cutting my loss’.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Raines

customer_reviews.title: This worked for our needs, but...
customer_reviews.text: We bought the full-size 3-inch Zinus topper so that we could cut it into two separate smaller mattresses for camping. They will be used in conjunction with cots. We covered them with two 'EarthTrek Extra Large Zippered Travel Sleeping Bag Liners' so the mattresses would be protected and easier to roll. It looks like this will probably work fairly well for us. My only criticism is the Zinus topper was beginning to delaminate on one corner. I've read other reviews with the same complaint. Time will tell weather these hold up to our needs or not. My only other concern is that the 'memory foam' layer may become stiff and hard during cold weather camping.
customer_reviews.author: Wishlist Jan

customer_reviews.title: VERY soft and mostly comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My finance and I love this mattress pad! It keeps us nice and cool and does not have a strong smell that I have experienced with other memory foam mattresses. It was ready to use immediately after opening. The only issue we have is that he is larger than I am, so it creates a "hole' that sucks me in at night. This is a soft foam, not a hard foam.
customer_reviews.author: KCL

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: The smell comes standard with any foam mattress, and fades quickly even if you aren't able to properly air it out. I was skeptical at first with the multiple creases and spots in the foam that didn't seem to be expanding, but it all evened out. I purchased the 1.5 inch in queen size and folded it to double it up, but will now be buying another since I have a bigger bed. I don't 5* things easily, but I'm always grateful to be pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: I’m sleeping on a cloud now!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! This mattress topper is phenomenal! My step Mom bought a different brand and she wishes she bought this one. The fact that the green section sinks down into the white but you still won’t touch your mattress like most toppers! My boyfriend and I have been on it all day every day since covid. It has yet to create dips and valleys. Still good as new. This is the best purchase I’ve ever made you won’t be dissatisfied at all, promise!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My partner is a truck driver and the mattress in her truck was a thin plastic mattress. I felt so bad that she wasn’t sleeping well at night and then driving all day so I decided to try getting her one of these! Best idea ever! She loves it and after visiting her truck last weekend and getting to ride along, I can see why! It is so comfortable now and feels like a real mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: It feels like I have a brand new mattress!
customer_reviews.text: It feels like I have a brand new mattress! I purchased the 3 inch version and it has made a huge difference in my sleep quality. You sink in a bit but you don't feel like you're being swallowed alive by the world's softest whale. I do suggest you check that your fitted sheets will be deep enough to fit properly, I had to purchase new ones, but that would be true with any mattress pad. This was probably the best purchase I've made on Amazon. Please do yourself a favor and get this! Sooooo worth it!!! 👍
customer_reviews.author: KittyQ

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Reccomend!!
customer_reviews.text: I have slept on a different sinus mattress and loved it. This one highly disappointed me. We attempted to sleep on it the first night with the included cover, it was so hard that it felt like sleeping on a cement floor. The second night we removed the cover, it made it a little bit softer but we still have to put 2 foam toppers on it to make it bearable. I have no back or hip issues, but when I sleep on this mattress my whole body hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a great sleeper and with back problems and arthritis the last thing I needed was a another "sleeping on rocks" night. I had purchased the 12 inch queen mattress for another bed in the house and it is heavenly to sleep on so I got this for my bed rather than discard the older mattress on it. So glad I did. Its soft without getting that "sinking" feeling and just kind of surrounds me in comfort. Nights are a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dolan

customer_reviews.title: This is nirvana
customer_reviews.text: An amazing product, this far exceeded my expectations. I have severe sometimes debilitating lower back pain which makes life truly miserable. The topper arrived fast and expanded in enough time to try it out that night, I slept so deeply and in the morning my back felt better than it has in a long time. I’ve been sleeping on it about 6 weeks now and I do turn it around once a week or more when I change the sheets. The only down side is how tall my bed is now which is not too much of negative but my dog can’t hop up! I would highly recommend this topper over any other on the market it surpasses the advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan but not in pain
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of this mattress cover! At first it’s really soft and comfy but after 30 minutes or so it feels like it molds to you and is actually difficult to change positions. I am a side sleeper and often switch sides during the night and struggled to do so with this. I was also not a fan that it’s significantly smaller than the mattress size and shows when you make the bed (4-6 inches smaller). Our RV mattress is a brick so this is an improvement but not by much.
customer_reviews.author: RV shopper

customer_reviews.title: Have bought 5 of these toppers so far
customer_reviews.text: Over the past few years I have bought 5 of the 4" toppers. It may actually be 6 now that I think of it. I have them in our house and trailer. I recommend this brand to all the folks on the trailer forums/groups when they are looking for something for the uncomfortable trailer mattress. These are very comfortable and a good value. Two of the queen mattresses were for our hybrid trailer so I put covers on them and rolled them up when traveling. They did fine being stored rolled up. I feel like I should buy stock in this company!
customer_reviews.author: K. abberley

customer_reviews.title: This product does not match the advertisement description for quality and or cost.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper was advertised as a short queen (RV use) however, when my husband and I placed it on top of our Queen RV short mattress it was much shorter and narrower than the one below. It was also advertised to significantly improve the comfort and softness of our existing mattress. While it did feel somewhat softer than our other mattress it did not meet cost expectations. I would not recommend this product to meet the expectations of the advertisement for this product. It is simply foam glued together.
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS M DALY

customer_reviews.title: The Cherry On Topper
customer_reviews.text: I had bought the least expensive full size mattress I could find on amazon and I thought that it would come ready to use. Unfortunately I knew nothing about beds and obviously you get what you pay for! It came ready to use of course but it was practically all springs. I tried adding a cheap topper but it didn’t work out and was too stiff, so I decided to add a topper on a topper. Not only did it help with the comfort but it also brought my bed height back up to normal with little under 3” of topper. My bed feels amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Alex V

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take long to grow to full size and no smell whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: This topper is awesome bought it for my short queen bed in my fifth wheel which we live in full time. We have been sleeping on it every night for about a month now and we sleep like a baby.We use a microfiber blanket over it instead of a sheet and it never moves at all. It grew to full size within 2 hours and there was no chemical smell whatsoever.For 30 bucks you can"t beat this. I should mention we are small people 165 and 120 Lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Donald McLellan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Awesome Awesome Topper !  5 STAR !
customer_reviews.text: Got a new mattress in a box based on reviews. Have severe issues due to old injuries. WRONG THING TO DO ! So I ordered new frame and researched very carefully for a topper and found this Zinus green topper.... Zinus ! Where have you been all my life !!! I feel like I have been given a brand new body !!! My only regret as of right now is I didn't get rid of the mattress in a box and just buy a Queen Zinus mattress instead but this is working very well for now.
customer_reviews.author: Gaerd Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: The price is fantastic. Unfortunately the life span of this product is less than 3 months. I bought the 1.5" twin sz on March 7th, 2018. I didn't put it on my bed until March 20th(when I got a new mattress). It was covered by a triple layer poly mattress pad. I am a light sleeper. customer_reviews.title: Comfy!

customer_reviews.author: Lydia Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.author: schion

customer_reviews.title: #1 choice if you want the best.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way it was packaged. The tote bag I'll use. The smell was faint as I flipped it after 12 hours and was gone after 24 hours. It opened up perfect. I am extremely satisfied with the cost, delivery time and product.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Leftige

customer_reviews.author: KR4Q

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleep
customer_reviews.text: This item is one awesome addition to any mattress. And I still smell it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanmarie

customer_reviews.title: Not too soft, not too firm, just right.
customer_reviews.text: Not as soft and unsupportive as pure memory foam and not quite as firm as plain old foam.... this provide the comfort of memory foam without feeling like you're sinking into the bed. I used this to top an elevated queen size air mattress that we use when we have extra guests... which on it's own is nearly as hard as a rock and has no insulating properties at all... on it's own it's uncomfortable and cold. But with this foam topper it's almost more comfortable than the $1000 mattress we sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

After my parents slept on it—it seemed to spread out more. My parents didn’t complain about it because that’s just the type of people they are. As for me, I was not too impressed. I kept it because I didn’t want the hassle of repacking.
customer_reviews.author: E Odum

I'm not bothering with a return/replacement since it is working for what I need it to work for, it's not worth that hassle, but definitely not getting 5 stars for the missing length.

My daughter and I slept in the trailer with the new mattresses for 6 nights quite comfortably.

customer_reviews.title: A nice add on of comfort and softness for a great price
